entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
